text: o visvasulara! Vyakta pariste miku badha kaligincedu visayalanu gurinci, miru prasnincakandi. Khur'an avatarimpa jeyabade tappudu, miru vatini gurinci prasniste! Avi miku visadaparaca badavaccu! Vati koraku (inta varaku miru cesina prasnala koraku) allah mim'malni mannincadu mariyu allah ksamasiludu, sahanasiludu
